css: .text{    color:#1f497d ;    font: 32px bold Arial, sans-serif;}.date{    background-color: #EFBE7D;   }.ship{    font-weight:bold;    font-size:20px;}.bgcolor{       background-color: #1f497d ;    color:#FFFFFF;    font-size:16px;    font-weight:bold;}table, th, td {  border: 1px solid black;  }hr{    border: 10px solid black;}
